show.title: In Search of Soil
show.summary: Exploring the mysteries of soil in search of answers that you can use in your garden or on your farm.  Each week features scientists and experts sharing insights into topics like soil science, composting, cover cropping, biochar, no-till, and fungi, among other things!   In Search of Soil is hosted and produced by Diego Footer.

title: Dr. Elaine Ingham - Soil Science | In Search of Soil #1
subtitle: Dr. Elaine Ingham - Soil Science | In Search of Soil #1
summary:
In this episode of In Search of Soil, we’ll be talking about the truths behind soil, break the myths behind it, and illuminate some interesting and intriguing ways to go about how to build soil. Our guest is one of the world’s leading soil biologists, Dr. Elaine Ingham, who will help us see soil in a new light.  Follow Dr. Elaine - https://www.soilfoodweb.com/
